Title: Relates to the possession, manufacture or sale of a trigger crank, a bump-fire device or other firing accelerators
Summary: Relates to the possession, manufacture or sale of a trigger crank, a bump-fire device or other firing accelerators.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law and the general business law, in relation to the possession, manufacture or sale of a trigger crank, a bump-fire device or other firing accelerators
